history.proof: intros P a HinPolySet. induction P. - inversion HinPolySet. - destruct HinPolySet as [Heq | HinPolySet]. + exists a0. split. left. symmetry. * shelve. * shelve. + shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) FPset := fun _ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => list (poly A0 eqA ltM) : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Type Co := lexprod (list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) FPset (RO A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os) Fl : {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> Prop a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Heq : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) P0 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) IHP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) P -> exists b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b P /\\ pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "Term A n" with "exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) H = a0".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
FPset: list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Type
Co: {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> Prop

Goal:
forall (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a : list (Term A n)), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P -> exists b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b P /\ a = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b

Premises:

CombLinear_minuspf : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q)

``` 
intros P a HinPolySet.
induction P.
- inversion HinPolySet.
- destruct HinPolySet as [Heq | HinPolySet].
  + exists a0. split. left. apply Heq. symmetry. apply s2p_morphism.
  + apply IHP in HinPolySet as [b [Hinb Heq]]. 
    exists b. split. right. apply Hinb. apply Heq.
```

original: intros P a HinPolySet. induction P. - inversion HinPolySet. - destruct HinPolySet as [Heq | HinPolySet]. + exists a0. split. left. apply Heq. symmetry. apply s2p_morphism. + apply IHP in HinPolySet as [b [Hinb Heq]]. exists b. split. right. apply Hinb. apply Heq.
